name: Interpolate 2 layers (with increasing number of dimensions)

in_ports.name: rear
in_ports.hint: [Optional] Rear matrix. If omitted, the front matrix is used instead.

controls.caption: New dimension
controls.description: Added dimension of the matrix (3rd if the sources are 2-dimensional, 4th if 3-dimensional etc.). Default value 2 means creating MxNx2 matrix (in 2-dimensional case), containing copies of front and rear matrices without interpolation.
controls.name: newDimension
